channel.title: Image Finder/Matcher
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I was thinking, if I do fail or end up being totally incompetent in making my own script to do the following, would anyone be able to do it? The script would be used to find a match in the image from a database of images. What do I mean?
For example, I would have a cropped portion of a particular image, and I have to find out what that particular image is. So I would run the script to find out what this image is by running through a database of images, seeing if that particular 'mystery' image is in the database.
Would anyone be able to do something like that? Or at least, guide me along in completing this script? Thanks so much in advance. Cheers!

item.title: Image Finder/Matcher
item.dc:creator: @soley soley
item.description:
@soley wrote:

Hi guys,

I was thinking, if I do fail or end up being totally incompetent in making my own script to do the following, would anyone be able to do it?

For example, I would have a cropped portion of a particular image, and I have to find out what that particular image is.
So I would run the script to find out what this image is by running through a database of images, seeing if that particular ‘mystery’ image is in the database.

Would anyone be able to do something like that? Or at least, guide me along in completing this script?
